# minimumSize

**Instance Property**

The minimum size necessary for the tab view to display tabs in a useful way.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var minimumSize: NSSize { get }
```

## Discussion

You can use the value of this property to limit how much a user can resize a tab view.

## Related Documentation

- **tabViewType**: The tab type to display the tabs.

## Determining the Size

- **contentRect**: The rectangle describing the content area of the tab view.
- **controlSize**: The size of the tab view.
